body:
I've added the Google-internal tool to google3/experimental/users/bradfitz/updateac/updateac.go for now so I don't lose it. We can put it somewhere better outside of experimental when it's code reviewed and we decide on a name and location. (which might prove more difficult than writing the tool)

I don't know what it takes to close this bug. I doubt we'll be able to auto-run the tool regularly, given its dependence on Google's internal CLA service.

We can at least run this again right before Go 1.6 is released.
